title: COUNTRY CLUB APARTMENTS- All Utilities Included
app_fee: Credit Check fee and move in fee
posting_body: ['6930 S. South Shore Drive   ----  COUNTRY CLUB APARTMENTS', 'COUNTRY CLUB APARTMENTS is a grand elevated building located on South Shore Drive right across from the South Shore Golf Course and Cultural Center on Lake Michigan.', ' It is a great location and has great scenic views.', 'Each apartment has ALL UTILITIES included.', '(HEAT, COOKING GAS and ELECTRIC are the utilities included with the rent.)', '  These classic apartments also include a stove and a  refrigerator.', ' Some Apartments have Carpeting and some have Hardwood floors.', 'In addition, FREE off street PARKING with any Studio, 1 or 2 Bedroom apartment lease is also available.', 'Small Studios are $650', 'Large Studios are $700', 'Small 1 Bedrooms are $760', 'Medium 1 Bedrooms are $800', 'Large 1 Bedrooms with a Dining Room are $990', '2 Bedrooms are $1,125', '$500 move-in fee for 2 Bedroom Apartment -- (no security deposit)', '$400 move-in fee for Large 1 Bedroom w/ Dining Room Apartment -- (no security deposit)', '$350 move in fee for all other Apartments -- (no security deposit)', 'For a viewing an apartment call:', 'COUNTRY CLUB APARTMENTS at (773)752-2200', 'Monday thru Friday 8:30 am to 4:00 pm', 'Saturday 8:30 am to 12:00 pm', 'Visit our website <URL> or search for our virtual apartment tours on <URL>.']
